dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Enables Editor Tracking.

See System Toolboxes\Data Management Tools.tbx\Fields\Enable Editor Tracking for details.

Dates will be recorded in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).

tool.name: EnableEditorTracking

param.name: feature
param.dialogReference: The feature class, table, mosaic dataset, or raster catalog that will have editor tracking enabled.
param.pythonReference: The feature class, table, mosaic dataset, or raster catalog that will have editor tracking enabled.

param.name: creator
param.dialogReference: The name of the field that will store the names of users who created features or records. If this field already exists, it must be a String field.
param.pythonReference: The name of the field that will store the names of users who created features or records. If this field already exists, it must be a String field.

param.name: create_date
param.dialogReference: The name of the field that will store the dates features or records were created. If this field already exists, it must be a Date field.
param.pythonReference: The name of the field that will store the dates features or records were created. If this field already exists, it must be a Date field.

param.name: editor
param.dialogReference: The name of the field that will store the names of users who last edited features or records. If this field already exists, it must be a String field.
param.pythonReference: The name of the field that will store the names of users who last edited features or records. If this field already exists, it must be a String field.

param.name: edit_date
param.dialogReference: The name of the field that will store the dates features or records were last edited. If this field already exists, it must be a Date field.
param.pythonReference: The name of the field that will store the dates features or records were last edited. If this field already exists, it must be a Date field.

param.name: addfields
param.displayname: Add fields if they don't exist
param.dialogReference:
Specifies whether to add fields if they don't already exist.

  • Unchecked窶認ields will not be added. Fields specified must already exist in the input dataset. This is the default.

  • Checked窶認ields will be added if they do not already exist.
param.pythonReference:
Specifies whether to add fields if they don't already exist.

  • Unchecked窶認ields will not be added. Fields specified must already exist in the input dataset. This is the default.

  • Checked窶認ields will be added if they do not already exist.
